name: Pyromaniacs
description:
Pyromaniacs is a two man project, that was done for a school project.

Pyromaniacs is a simple 2D Bomberman clone that could be played with two, three or four players.

What do you have to do?

All players will spawn in one of each corner of the map. When the game starts you have to  survive the round. The goal is to be the last player alive and collect points. If you have the required amount of points (defined in the Options Menu), you will win the match.

Powerups

Powerups are hidden inside the rocks. So you have to destroy these rocks to find a powerup.

  • Speed: Your movement speed  get increased by a small value
  • +1 Bomb: Place one more bomb when you pickup this Power Up
  • Shield: For a few seconds you have a shield that protects you from bombs and fire.
  • +1 Radius: Increases the spread radius of the fire
